info.name: the RPF - Dark
info.description: A dark theme for the RPF.
info.additionalInfo:
May contain glitches, but I think I have found most of them.
v0.8.7.3

0.8.7.3 - Fixes comments background on RPF Pulse
0.8.7.2 - Updates for RPF Pulse
0.8.7.1 - Attempted to correct Quick Nav and Top buttons to work on all pages
0.8.7 - Fixed Quick Navigation and Top buttons
0.8.6.9 - Fixed Sub-Forums Background
0.8.6.8 - Fixed Show Signature
0.8.6.7 - Fixed Gallery comments
0.8.6.6 - Fixed lightbox background
0.8.6.5 - Fixed Uploads background (I think 0.8.6 caused the problem)
0.8.6 - Restored transparency to "craft your fandom"
0.8.5 - Fixed Code background, Attachments background and Subscription background, attempted to fix reply background
0.8.4 - Fixed Articles border
0.8.3 - Removed full width from code (cocomonk22's the RPF -Full Width can be run simultaneously to add that feature)
0.8.2 - Fixed reply box border, reply button border and theme select background color
0.8.1 - Dimmed Text Color
